nodes.text: The DPx yacht was a 12-meter, "top of the line" yacht from Uulshos Manufacturing. A popular variant of the ship was the long-range scout ship called the Deep-X Explorer.
The DPx yacht had a dual-engine configuration, making it exceptionally powerful. The large forward-swept-wings made it maneuverable in atmosphere.
Jedi Knight Kina Ha used a DPx for her travels, and later during her hidden watch on her homeworld of Kamino.
